adDetails: Kitty Sitting & Boarding Book now for your upcoming trips! I make visits to your home & board kitties in my home as well. 3 pet limit for boarding in my home(only have a total of 3 pets max at a time in my home).. So each kitty gets plenty of individual love & attention. $16-$18/visits to your home ($3 additional cat) $22-$25/boarding/day my home ($5 additional cat) I have great references & a very flexible schedule. Email me today with Dates & what services you are in need of. Thx! ** I do offer discounts
